description:
Mobile-Responsive UI Implementation and Optimization

Ensure the application provides an optimal user experience across all mobile devices with proper touch interactions, responsive layouts, and comprehensive cross-device testing.

Requirements:
- Implement responsive breakpoints for mobile (320px-480px), tablet (481px-768px), and desktop (769px+)
- Ensure all interactive elements meet minimum touch target size of 44x44px
- Optimize layout patterns for mobile viewports (collapsible navigation, stacked content, adaptive grids)
- Configure viewport meta tag correctly to prevent unwanted zooming and enable proper scaling
- Adapt typography and spacing for mobile readability
- Ensure images and media are responsive with appropriate srcset/sizes attributes
- Test horizontal and vertical orientations on mobile devices
- Verify touch gestures work correctly (tap, swipe, scroll, pinch-to-zoom where appropriate)
- Test across multiple devices: iOS (iPhone), Android phones, tablets of varying sizes
- Validate no horizontal scrolling occurs unintentionally on mobile viewports
- Ensure forms are mobile-friendly with appropriate input types and keyboard handling
- Test performance on mobile networks and devices (consider slower connections)
- Verify accessibility features work on mobile screen readers

Success Criteria:
- All pages render correctly on devices 320px width and above
- Touch targets pass accessibility guidelines (WCAG 2.5.5)
- Application receives passing scores on mobile usability tests (Google Mobile-Friendly Test, Lighthouse mobile audit)
- No layout shifts or broken UI elements on tested devices
title: Implement responsive design across all devices
